titleStmt.title: The unlawfulnesse of mixt-marriages, or, An answer to a book entituled Mixt-marriages vindicated in a dialogue between A and B written by Stephen Tory in a friendly discourse between E and F, first, shewing that for persons to be joyned together in marriage, who differ from institutions in matters of religion, is contrary to the law of God and therefore sinful : secondly, that such marriages being the breach of a law, that there is a rule left to the church to excommunicate persons for so marrying : together with a word to those congregations in general who allow of mixt marriages, and another to Mr. Tory in particular / by John Griffith.
